item.title: DOJ urges Supreme Court to reject Trump request to delay TikTok ban law
item.description: Last week, Trump filed a legal brief arguing he should have time after taking office on Jan. 20 to pursue a "political resolution" to the issue.

item.title: Chinese dams to be discussed in India visit of U.S. national security adviser
item.description: Washington and its Western allies have long viewed India as a counter to China's rising influence in Asia and beyond.

item.title: Microsoft expects to spend $80 billion on AI-enabled data centers in fiscal 2025
item.description: Over half of Microsoft's $80 billion in spending will take place in the U.S., Microsoft Vice Chair and President Brad Smith wrote in a Friday blog pos...

item.title: Trump sentencing set for Jan. 10, judge leans toward no jail, no probation, no fine
item.description: Donald Trump is the first U.S. president ever to be convicted of a crime.

item.title: S&P 500, Nasdaq snap five-day losing streak, but still close lower on the week: Live updates
item.description: Wall Street was coming off a choppy trading session, but Nvidia helped push the market higher on Friday.
